question.title: Project reactor compatiblity with couchbase
question.body:
I am using project reactor library, where I am fetching data from couchbase. The retrieval of data from couchbase is taking 2 sec which is causing latency issue.

There is a thread blockage from project reactor which is causing delay.

Instead of project reactor, I tried with spring binder and it was working fine, but I want to use project reactor only and know the issue for thread blocking.

Code:

Reactive<String, data> client;

public Mono<Wrapper> process(Wrapper wrapper) {
    watch.start();
    return client.get(wrapper.getEvent().getId(), Data.class)
            .doOnNext(data -> {
                watch.stop();
                wrapper.setData(Data);
            })
            .thenReturn(wrapper);
}
